parameters:
\bustMsgExp[1, 4]\nc<Saki>How is it? It's a really good company, isn't it? It's hard
to believe they're a client of ours.

\bustMsgExp[2, 1]\nc<Senpai>...Yes, indeed. There certainly weren't any problematic
scenes.
\bustMsgExp[1, 0]\nc<Saki>So, what should we do about the editing?

\bustMsgExp[2, 0]\nc<Senpai>Editing? Oh, there's no need for that. Actually, I just had
you investigate because it seemed suspicious.

\bustMsgExp[2, 1]\nc<Senpai>By the way, we need to clean up here a bit. It's covered in
love juices everywhere... It seems like we were really
focused on watching.

\bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>Ugh, you're right... Will you come with me next time,
Senpai?

\bustMsgExp[2, 0]\nc<Senpai>Well, if there's a chance, maybe I should go at least once?
(There are still some things that don't sit right with me...
but it's probably just my imagination. Maybe it wouldn't
hurt to go at least once?)

\nc<>After cleaning up, Saki and her Senpai deleted the footage
and left the room.
